executable.title: Coregister B0 to Anatomy Rigid
executable.description: This program will register a NRRD diffusion weighted 4D vector image to a fixed anatomical image to produce a rigid fit.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Image Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the NRRD vector image to fit to the anatomical image

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input vector image file name. It is recommended that the input volume is the skull stripped baseline image of the DWI scan.
image.label: Input Image Volume

image.name: inputAnatomicalVolume
image.description: Required: input anatomical image file name. It is recommended that that the input anatomical image has been skull stripped and has the same orientation as the DWI scan.
image.label: Input Anatomical Image Volume

integer.name: vectorIndex
integer.description: Vector image index in the moving image (within the DWI) to be used for registration.
integer.label: Vector Image Index

file.name: outputRigidTransform
file.description: Required: filename for the rigid fit transform.
file.label: Output Rigid Transform

parameters.label: Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Input registration parameters controlling the fit

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.description: Number of iterations in the selected 3D fit
integer.label: Number Of Iterations

integer.name: numberOfSamples
integer.description: The number of voxels sampled for mutual information computation. Increase this for a slower, more careful fit. NOTE that it is suggested to use samplingPercentage instead of this option. However, if set, it overwrites the samplingPercentage option.
integer.label: Number Of Samples

double.name: samplingPercentage
double.label: Percentage Of Samples
double.description: This is a number in (0.0,1.0] interval that shows the percentage of the input fixed image voxels that are sampled for mutual information computation. Increase this for a slower, more careful fit. You can also limit the sampling focus with ROI masks and ROIAUTO mask generation. The default is to use approximately 5% of voxels (for backwards compatibility 5% ~= 500000/(256*256*256)). Typical values range from 1% for low detail images to 20% for high detail images.

integer.name: initialRotationAxis
integer.description: Axis for the initial rotation angle: 0, 1, 2 mean x, y, z, respectively.
integer.label: Initial Rotation Axis

float.name: initialRotationAngle
float.description: Angle to rotate about the initial rotation angle (Degrees)
float.label: Initial Rotation Angle

float.name: relaxationFactor
float.description: Fraction of gradient from Jacobian to attempt to move in the selected 3D fit
float.label: Relaxation Factor

float.name: maximumStepSize
float.description: Maximum permitted step size to move in the selected 3D fit
float.label: Maximum Step Size

float.name: minimumStepSize
float.description: Minimum required step size to move in the selected 3D fit without converging -- decrease this to make the fit more exacting
float.label: Minimum Step Size

float.name: spatialScale
float.description: How much to scale up changes in position compared to unit rotational changes in radians -- decrease this to put more translation in the fit
float.label: Spatial Scale
